io.libraft.kayvee.mappers
Class KayVeeExceptionMapper

java.lang.Object
  io.libraft.kayvee.mappers.KayVeeExceptionMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<KayVeeException>
@Provider
public final class KayVeeExceptionMapper
extends Object

Specialization of KayVeeLoggingExceptionMapper that transforms a KayVeeException into an HTTP response with the corresponding status code. Possible status codes are shown below:

  • CannotSubmitCommandException with CannotSubmitCommandException.getLeader() as !null: MOVED PERMANENTLY (301).
  • CannotSubmitCommandException with CannotSubmitCommandException.getLeader() as null: SERVICE UNAVAILABLE (503).
  • KeyNotFoundException: NOT FOUND (404).
  • KeyAlreadyExistsException: CONFLICT (409).
  • ValueMismatchException: CONFLICT (409.)
